name: Transit Home Stay
tag_list: service-apartments, service-apartment, serviced-apartments, budget-service-apartments, budget-service-apartments-bangalore, service-apartments-electronic-city
overview:
Transit Home Stay, housing 16 contemporary serviced apartments is located on Hosur Road, close of Electronic City, Bangalore and surrounded by large software companies and corporates.

TRANSIT LIVING, the parent company, has been in the hospitality industry for almost a decade, has acquired an in depth understanding of the Bangalore Hospitality market and it is in this understanding that we have come out with superior living spaces, right at the heart of the silicon valley offering unbeatable Value for money accommodation

All this without a single compromise on quality, without cutting corners and we assure to pamper you with all the facilities you are used to as a Business Traveller.

So if you are in search of Affordable Service Apartments in Bangalore, but equally choosy on quality and location, your search would definitely end here at our doorstep

external_links.title: Service Apartments in Mysore Road Bangalore
